sentences.en: A new technological marvel was invented at Cambridge University in England, the scanning electron microscope.
sentences.cn: 一项科技新奇迹在英国剑桥大学诞生了——这就是扫描电子显微镜。

sentences.en: A successful company must keep up with the pace of technological change.
sentences.cn: 一家成功的公司必须得跟上技术变革的步伐.

sentences.en: His parents are scientific and technological workers.
sentences.cn: 他的父母都是科技工作者.

sentences.en: I think Israel tends to be at the leading edge of technological development.
sentences.cn: 我认为以色列在技术发展领域往往处于最前沿。

sentences.en: In the late 1850s the speed of technological change quickened.
sentences.cn: 19世纪50年代末期，技术变革的速度加快了。

sentences.en: Technological innovations have brought innumerable benefits.
sentences.cn: 技术革新已经带来了无穷的好处.

sentences.en: The company has developed a reputation as a technological laggard in the personal-computer arena.
sentences.cn: 该公司在个人电脑领域因技术落后遭人诟病。

sentences.en: The steam engine was the greatest technological advance of the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽机是19世纪最伟大的技术进步。

sentences.en: The young man displayed his talent for the first time in the scientific and technological circles.
sentences.cn: 那个青年人在科技界初露锋芒.

sentences.en: There is no safety in unlimited technological hubris.
sentences.cn: 在技术方面自以为是会很危险.

sentences.en: They are in the vanguard of technological advance.
sentences.cn: 他们是技术发展的先导.

sentences.en: Today, the pace of life is increasing with technological advancements.
sentences.cn: 当今, 随着科技进步,生活节奏不断增快.

sentences.en: We are determined to set up a complete, rationally distributed scientific and technological research system.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要建成布局合理、相互配套的科研体系.

sentences.en: With technological changes many traditional skills have become obsolete.
sentences.cn: 随着技术的革新，许多传统技艺已被淘汰。

words.tran_cn: 工艺的，科技的；技术上的；专门的
技术上；专门地；学术上；工艺上
技师，技术员；技巧纯熟的人
专家管理；专家政治论，技术统治论
技术统治论者；专家政治论者；技术统治
技术恐惧（指对技术对社会及环境造成不良影响的恐惧）

phrases.tran_cn: 工艺演变；科学技术进步
技术规格，技术要求；工艺要求
科技革命；[经]工业技术革命

trans.tran_cn: 技术上的，工艺（学）的，因技术革新而造成的
